name: test_e2e_with_logs[828_REDIR_URL_001]
description:

| Item | Value |

| **Pattern ID** | `REDIR_URL_001` |
| **Name** | Open redirect via url param |
| **Category** | OPEN_REDIRECT |
| **Subcategory** | url_param |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details
